#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
int x[1000];
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    vector<int> a;
    int t,n,i,j,k,sum;
    cin>>n;
    while(n!=0)
    {
               k=0;
               sum=0;
               for(i=0;i<n;i++)
               {
                               cin>>t;
                               a.push_back(t);
               }
               sort(a.begin(),a.end());
               reverse(a.begin(),a.end());
               i=0;
               if(n%2==0)
               {
               j=n/2;
               for(i=0;i<=(n/2)-1;i++)
               {
               x[k++]=a[j];
               x[k++]=a[i];
               j++;
               }
               }
               else
               {
               j=(n/2)+1;
               for(i=0;i<=(n/2)-1;i++)
               {
                 x[k++]=a[j];
                 x[k++]=a[i];
                 j++;                 
               }
              x[k]=a[i];
               }
               if(n==1)
               {
               cout<<a[0]<<endl;
               }
               else
               {
               for(i=0;i<=n-2;i++)
               sum=sum+abs(x[i]-x[i+1]);
               if(n%2==0)
               cout<<sum<<endl;
               else
               cout<<sum<<endl;
               }
               
               
              //INSERT HERE//
               
               
               //for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              // cout<<x[i]<<" ";            
               done:a.clear();
               cin>>n;
    }
    return 0;
}
